thread.title: Tesla’s Elon Musk Responds to Consumer Reports Model S Criticism
thread.title_full: Tesla’s Elon Musk Responds to Consumer Reports Model S Criticism

title: Tesla’s Elon Musk Responds to Consumer Reports Model S Criticism
text:
Tesla’s Elon Musk Responds to Consumer Reports Model S Criticism 
Time Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
rescinded its recommendation for the Model S based on consumer surveys about reliability. Survey respondents noted issues with the Model S’s drivetrain, charging equipment and computerized center console, among other issues....
